tag_list: design, packaging-design, web-design-glasgow, website-design-glasgow, search-engine-optimasation, graphic, catalogues, g66, design-agency-glasgow, google
overview: Barry Porter-Robinson is the owner of BR Design of Kirkintilloch, Glasgow, Scotland. Barry has had a long career in IT, he worked in Los Angeles with two major search engines and is now resident in Scotland where he is the director of BR Design and the IT Director of Business Growth Now which is a company which offers training in social media, IT, sales and marketing. He has designed countless websites for clients all over the world. BR Design offers affordable design with the right ideas and provides professional websites, graphic design and consulting for print, the internet and apparel. The company also offers seo, search engine marketing, email marketing, CMS, domain name acquisition and e commerce services as well as creating company branding, logos, sales’marketing materials etc.
